name: Khuzani
description: '''Khuzani Nkosikhona Innocent Mpungose''' (born December 3, 1989), professionally known as '''Khuzani or khuba'''  is a South African singer. Born and raised in [[Nkandla, KwaZulu-Natal|Nkandla]], [[KwaZulu-Natal]], he rose to prominence after participating in Mgqumeni's posthumous 2010 album ''iSecret''.
